Redshirt junior quarterback Kyler Murray waits for the play to begin during the first half of the game against FAU Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

ESPN released a feature on Oklahoma quarterback Kyler Murray Saturday morning ahead of the Sooners game against UCLA PERIOD

Marty Smiths  story details the redshirt junior taking over the starting job at Oklahoma after Heisman Trophy winner Baker Mayfield graduated and Murray being drafted by the Oakland Athletics with the No PERIOD  pick PERIOD

The feature shows how Murray has taken the college football world by storm after just one game as the Sooners starter PERIOD Murray threw for  yards and two touchdowns in Oklahomas season opener against Florida Atlantic PERIOD

Watch the full story here
